schema.name: TAP_SCHEMA
schema.description: Schema dedicated to TAP. It contains all information about available schemas, tables and columns.

column.name: table_name
column.description: table name as it should be used in queries

column.name: utype
column.description: UTYPE if table corresponds to a data model

column.name: utype
column.description: UTYPE if schema corresponds to a data model

column.name: from_column
column.description: key column name in the from_table

column.name: target_column
column.description: key column name in the target_table

column.name: principal
column.description: a principal column; 1 means true, 0 means false

column.name: indexed
column.description: an indexed column; 1 means true, 0 means false

column.name: std
column.description: a standard column; 1 means true, 0 means false

table.name: public.flux
table.description: Flux information about an astronomical object

table.name: public.mesXmm
table.description: XMM log

column.name: mespos
column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

table.name: public.mesHerschel
table.description: Herschel log

column.name: mespos
column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

table.name: public.mesHgamma
table.description: Values of the equivalent width of the H{gamma} line,from Petrie et al.,Publ. Dominion Astrophys. Obs. 14,151,1973,and continuations.

column.name: mespos
column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

column.name: width_prec
column.description: Precision (# of decimal positions) associated with the column width

table.description: Stellar Rotational Velocities.

column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

column.name: vsini_prec

column.name: majaxis
column.description: Major axis of the error ellipse

column.name: minaxis

column.name: minaxis_prec

column.name: posangle
column.description: Position angle of the error ellipse

column.name: posangle_prec
column.description: Precision (# of decimal positions) associated with the column posangle

column.name: epoch_prec
column.description: Precision (# of decimal positions) associated with the column epoch

table.name: public.mesMK
table.description: MK classifications in the Morgan-Keenan system and the Michigan Catalogues of Two-Dimensional Spectral Types for the HD stars (Houk N.,1975,and seq.).

column.name: mespos
column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

column.name: plus_err_prec
column.description: Precision (# of decimal positions) associated with the column plus_err

table.name: public.mesISO
table.description: Infrared Space Observatory (ISO) log

column.name: mespos
column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

column.name: ra_prec

column.name: dec_prec

table.name: public.mesClg
table.description: Cluster of Galaxies: Abell & Corwin,Astrophys. J. Suppl.,70,1 (1989).

column.name: mespos
column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

column.name: nbclust
column.description: number of cluster members between m3 and m3+2

column.name: abellClass
column.description: Cluster classification in Abell s system

column.name: BMclass
column.description: Cluster classification in the Bautz-Morgan system

column.name: m1
column.description: Weighted mean total V mag. estimate for the fist-ranked cluster member

column.name: m3
column.description: Weighted mean total V mag. estimate for the third-ranked cluster member

column.name: m10
column.description: Weighted mean total V mag. estimate for the tenth-ranked cluster member

column.name: m10a
column.description: Weighted mean total V mag. estimate for the tenth-ranked cluster member (xxx)

table.name: public.mesFe_h
table.description: The Stellar Metallicity Values are taken from the compilation by Cayrel de Strobel G.,et all,published in A&AS (1997A&AS..124..299C); the catalogue is numbered <III/200> in the CDS archive.

column.name: mespos
column.description: Position of a measurement in a list of measurements

column.name: log_g
column.description: Decimal logarithm of the surface gravity

column.name: log_g_prec
column.description: Precision (# of decimal positions) associated with the column log_g

column.name: fe_h
column.description: Metallicity index relative to the Sun

column.name: fe_h_prec
column.description: Precision (# of decimal positions) associated with the column fe_h

column.name: compstar
column.description: Designates the comparison star from which the [Fe/H] value was obtained

column.name: catno
column.description: Star in the Cayrel et al. (1997A&AS..124..299C) compilation

table.name: public.author
table.description: Author of a bibliographic reference

column.name: pos
column.description: Position of the author in the bib ref

table.name: public.mesIRAS

column.name: f25_unc
column.description: percent relative flux density uncertainties for f25

column.name: f100_prec

column.name: f100_unc
column.description: percent relative flux density uncertainties for f100

column.name: conflag
column.description: confusion flags (c) for the four bands

column.name: var
column.description: percent likelihood of variability of the source in the far infra-red

column.name: nbass
column.description: Number of associated (optical) sources in the original catalog
